name: Devotion and Renewal: The Saga of the Goddess Statue
name_original: Devotion and Renewal: The Saga of the Goddess Statue
description:
You have been living for many many years with the blessing of the Goddess Statue you discovered centuries ago. It has granted you eternal youth in exchange for your protection and praise. Now the evil has come to your domain to wage the final battle!

Gather resources, upgrade your posessions, engage the enemy and praise the goddess statue in order to fight and win against the Lord of Darkness!

May the blessing of the Goddess be with you.

Credits:
